User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

Browsing as normal with 5-20 tabs open 


Actual results:

the system toolbar (and toolbar only) randomly freezes so that no drop-downs are accessible (including the apple menu).  Clicking out of ff enables the toolbar functional again, but firefox-only drop downs are accessible only upon restart (a pain, needless to say, especially when on minimal bandwidth with multiple tabs).  Now happened three times since upgrading to 5; so many tabs open impossible to isolate which site may be contributing to error


Expected results:

Ummm, dropdowns should always work?
